hero.title: Enhance your Dental Clinic Efficiently
hero.label: Simplify processes, centralize information and boost your clinic's productivity with an intelligent platform made for the dental sector.

modules.title: Features and Modules
modules.label: Integrated modules that work together to deliver a complete clinical management experience.

calendar.title: Smart Agenda
calendar.label: Automated scheduling system with SMS/WhatsApp confirmation and waiting list management.

financial-management.title: Financial
financial-management.label: Complete control of income, expenses, cash flow and integration with payment systems.

electronic-pontuary.title: Electronic Medical Record
electronic-pontuary.label: Complete digital medical history, interactive odontogram and exam and image attachments.

reports.title: Real-Time Reports
reports.label: Intuitive dashboards with performance metrics, productivity and financial indicators.

benefits.title: Benefits for Clinics and Hospitals
benefits.label: Proven results that transform the management of your clinic and directly impact the quality of patient care.

productivity.title: Increased Productivity
productivity.label: Automate repetitive processes and focus on what really matters: caring for your patients.

coasts.title: Cost Reduction
coasts.label: Eliminate waste, optimize resources and have full control over the clinic’s finances

patient-experience.title: Patient Experience
patient-experience.label: Provide more agile and personalized service with quick access to the complete history.

time-economy.title: Time Saving
time-economy.label: Reduce the time spent on administrative tasks and dedicate more time to clinical care.

transform-your-clinic.title: Transform your
transform-your-clinic.label: More than 500 practices already trust DentalSys to modernize their processes, increase operational efficiency and deliver an exceptional patient experience.

testimonials.title: Testimonials and Success Stories
testimonials.label: See what our customers say about the results obtained with DentalSys in their clinics and offices.

pricing.title: Plans & Prices
pricing.label: No matter how big your time-saving automation needs, we're here to help you grow.

product.title: Ready to transform your clinic?
product.label: Join more than 500 clinics that have already revolutionized their management with DentalSys.

demonstration.title: Demo
demonstration.label: See in practice how the system adapts to your clinic’s routine, with a tailor-made presentation

consulting.title: Free consultancy
consulting.label: Receive personalized guidance to configure and optimize the system, ensuring fast and efficient deployment.

support.title: Expert support
support.label: Count on an experienced team ready to help at each stage, from system configuration to system maintenance.

migration.title: Data migration
migration.label: Transfer your information with complete security and continuity, without impacting the functioning of your clinic.

footer.label: Complete management system for dental clinics, hospitals and offices.
